resources.string:
V1.1.2

- Fix for hang on start on some Samsung devices

V1.1.1

- Debugging fix to allow developer to read backtraces (proguard off)

V1.1.0

- A brand new story following on from the events of TTA1
- New look and feel with fonts and textures
- Beautiful illustrations to elaborate the story
- A wonderful map which reveals itself as you explore
- Quick hints system in case you get a bit stuck
- A walkthrough in case you get really stuck!
